Timepicker.requires: oop, event-custom, attribute, base, dom, classnamemanager, widget, event
Timepicker.name: Timepicker

Y.Saw.Timepicker.name: Y.Saw.Timepicker

_syncTime.description:
This method syncs the value of time object,
including building the strings for 12hr and 24hr
also fires a 'timeset' event

params.name: rowId
params.description: the unique classname for the row to identify it later

makeCell.description: Creates a cell based on the little template defined in "str"

params.name: the
params.description:
time attribute object with the following attributes
<dl>
<dt>hour</dt>
<dd>The 12 hour hour</dd>
<dt>minute</dt>
<dd>The minutes</dd>
<dt>s12hour</dt>
<dd>A string representing the 12 hour time, with a seperator and an am/pm indicator as defined in strings</dd>
<dt>s24hour</dt>
<dd>A string representing the 24 hour time, with the seperator defined in strings</dd>
</dl>

timeset.description:
Fires when a new time has been set (after the time strings)
have been built. Use this event rather than timeChange.

cellclick.description: Fires when a cell is clicked on

Y.Saw.Timepicker.description:
a YUI 3 implementation of the classic jQuery
timepicker widget
